message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to invest in a premium product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that has the potential to revolutionize your business. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the competitive price of $10000. What do you say? Will you take the plunge and make this deal happen?
I'm not sure if I'm ready to commit to this purchase without knowing the product's quality. Can you give me a chance to inspect it first?

Are you ready to take a closer look?

I appreciate the offer, but I'm still hesitant. Given the 66.67% chance of it being low-quality, I'd rather not spend the $10000 on a product that might not be worth it to me. Can I just wait and see if the next product is better?
